name: df-so
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wor(c0, c1), wa(wpo(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
comment: Define the strict complete (linear) order predicate. The expression ` R Or A ` is true if relationship ` R ` orders ` A ` . For example, ` < Or RR ` is true ( ~ ltso ). Equivalent to Definition 6.19(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 29. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1996.)
